ENGLISH

The programming logic is certainly the most important for learning to program and our course is designed for people who DO NOT HAVE ANY KNOWLEDGE IN PROGRAMMING, use simple language and approach all topics relevant and necessary to familiarize yourself with the logic programming, this course is independent of language, since the logic is basic to any language, you learn the logic and then later choose in which language you will program. Everything is done step by step, teaching the details. Altogether there are more than 22 hours of classes, are solved step by step over 70 years, several lectures in simple language and easy to understand, even if you never had contact with programming surely learn to develop logical reasoning for any language.
